summary.span: 表示 对象的集合，并用于包含 控件和 控件的项。

span.span: Represents a collection of objects, and is used to hold the items of a control and a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 访问属性控件或属性控制检索对象。Accessing the property of a control or the property of a control retrieves a object. 你可以添加或从运行时集合删除项。You can add or remove items from the collection at run time. A对象继承自接口。A object inherits from the interface. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何操作中的项对象通过类。The following code example shows how you manipulate items in the object through the class. 该代码使用到的选定的项的索引属性。The code uses the selected item's index into the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法不是位于只读接口。This method is not available in the read-only interface. 你可以使用其中此方法适用的所有类的方法。You can use the method for all the classes where this method applies. 例如，方法集合清除集合中的或有关的所有样式，它将都清除集合中的所有选项。For example, the method for a collection clears all the styles in the collection; or for the , it clears all the choices in the collection. 将字段添加到字段的对象列表更改数据绑定行为的控件，并要求你将数据重新绑定到控件。Adding a field to the fields of an object list changes the data-binding behavior of the control, and requires you to bind data to the control again.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法后，属性将返回`true`。After this method has been called, the property will return `true`. 此外，属性中的对象将设置为`true`。Also, the property of the objects in the will be set to `true`.
